    public class RetryLimitCredentialsMatcher
extends org.apache.shiro.authc.credential.HashedCredentialsMatcher
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    输错5次密码锁定半小时，ehcache.xml配置
    作者:
    L.cm
